title: Why we watch Jordan Peterson for the same reasons we watched The Office
description:
The audio may be out of sync. Sorry about that. I had to do some quick and dirty editing so didn't have time to scrap it and start over. I'm still wrangling with the question of why we watch Jordan Peterson and why he's important. 

here's the link to the original Peterson Biblical Series 9 video. https://youtu.be/GmuzUZTJ0GA
